text:
The NA LCS returns as we kick off week one of the 2017 Spring Split!
Continue reading for a (spoiler free) look at team info, schedules, and VODs once they become available!

( Please be aware that this post WILL BE UPDATED as the action continues throughout the week. VODs and any other pertinent info will be posted once available! ) 

Table of Contents 2017 NA LCS Spring Week 1 Team Rosters Stream Schedule 
2017 NA LCS Spring Week 1 
The  2017 NA LCS Spring Split  features North America's top ten teams -  Team Solomid, FlyQuest, Echo Fox, Cloud9, Team Envy, Team Liquid, Team Dignitas, Phoenix1 , Counter Logic Gaming , and Immortals - playing against each other for championship points and a chance to represent their region at the 2017 World Championship!

Be sure to read up on the  2017 LCS Spring Split Scheduling and Rules ! Catch up on the full NA LCS rules  here  or browse the 2017 season changes article here . As previously announced for all Riot run leagues, NA LCS is moving up to a 10 ban system.
LCS Spring Split Week 1  will be played on   patch 7.1 ! 


Team Rosters: We've had quite a few roster swaps heading into the 2017 NA LCS Spring split, here's a refresher on  the current team rosters as we head into Week 1:

Counter Logic Gaming : Top - Darshan Jungle - Xmithie Mid - Huhi ADC - Stixxay Support - aphromoo 
TSM Top - Hauntzer Jungle - Svenskeren Mid - Bjergsen ADC - WildTurtle Support - Biofrost 
FlyQuest : Top - Balls Jungle - Moon Mid - Hai ADC - Altec Support - LemonNation 
Team Envy Top - Seraph Jungle - Lira Mid - Ninja ADC - Apollo Support - Hakuho` 
Phoenix1 Top - Zig Jungle - Inori Mid - Ryu ADC - Arrow Support - Adrian 
Team Dignitas Top - Ssumday Jungle - Chaser Mid - Keane ADC - LOD Support - Xspecial 
Immortals Top - Flame Jungle - Dardoch Mid - Pobelter ADC - Cody Sun Support - Olleh 
Cloud 9 Top - Impact Jungle - Contractz Mid - Jensen ADC - Sneaky Support - Smoothie 
Team Liquid Top - Lourlo Jungle - Reignover Mid - Goldenglue ADC - Piglet Support - Matt 
Echo Fox Top - Looper Jungle - Akaadian Mid - Froggen ADC - Keith Support - Gate
